Summary: saw bright lights comming over Highway 60 between Aurora, Mo and Monett MO
divs: sighting detailswe were headed west on us highway 60 between aurora, mo nad monett on december 28, 2000 around 9pm cst. it was a cloudy foggy night with poor visability, (no normal aircraft were flying). cloud ceiling was less than a 1\4 of a mile. my husband and i observed a bright strobing light comming through the clouds passing slowly from the south to north north east. it crossed in front of us making no audiable noises. there was aprox. 20 to 25 cars on that portion of the road. by the descriptions i have heard and read about, i think this was the same ufo that appeared so many other places around the same time. the object itself was not visable just the lights. we would have been southeast of the salina ks sighting and northeast of the oklahoma sightings and about the right time. i wish we could have seen the object but cloud cover prevented it. we checked when we got home and there was no aircraft aloft except for comercial jets that could get above the cloud cover. if you have any questions please give me a call anytime. thanks
trends: There have been no other sightings in Monett
This sighting has never been favorited.
